chess.core
Class ChessGame

java.lang.Object
  chess.core.ChessGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
public class ChessGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants, java.io.Serializable

ChessGame contains all the necessary information for a chess game, such as the chess board, game and player parameters, timers, history, etc.

Author:
Arvydas Bancewicz
See Also:
